::DrillBit::

DrillBit watched the base go up in smoke, through a window port.(If
there is any, on phobia's ship?" He remembered that the fusion cannon he
built was destroyed, in there.
"Damn." He wispered to himself.(I'm letting it be destroyed, because
Yanshosh abjected to its power.) He saw Dollen bring in KitKat. He ran
to her.
"Let me take her." He said, to Dollen.
"Honey, can you hear me?" He asked, KitKat.
